title: FL2 Closue
content:
Hello
Following a review of your account, we have identified activity that is inconsistent with fair play and the intended use of promotional rewards at MrQ.
As stated in our Fair Use Policy, ‚ÄúAny promotional offer you receive will be subject to this policy ‚Ä¶ We believe in fair play, hence there are no wagering requirements on any of our offers.‚Äù This means that although promotions carry no wagering requirement, they are still issued on the basis of genuine, entertainment-based gameplay and must not be used primarily for extracting promotional value.
Under the General Terms & Conditions (specifically the section relating to ‚Äúabusing player Accounts‚Äù), prohibited promotional play includes:
‚Ä¢ Holding more than one account.
‚Ä¢ Placing equal, zero or very low-margin bets.
‚Ä¢ Using the website solely for the purpose of claiming bonuses without intention to deposit or wager with real money.
Since our review shows that your account was used in a way that matches these forms of promotional abuse, we have exercised our rights under the Terms & Conditions to take action.
As a result, your account has been permanently closed, and all future participation in promotions is void. Any real-money balance remaining has been returned to your verified withdrawal method.
Please note that the decision is made in accordance with the above-quoted policy and terms. If you believe this decision has been reached in error, you may request a review by replying to this email and we will reopen the case for reassessment.

6.2. You may only hold one account. If we discover that you hold or are operating more than one account and/or the same payment details are used across multiple accounts, these will be classified as ‚ÄúDuplicate Accounts.‚Äù

We get that mistakes happen ‚Äì we‚Äôre only human after all ‚Äì so please take this as a friendly warning. From here on out, make sure your payment methods are only used on your own MrQ account.
